input.sentences: the bride and groom walked down the aisle together .
they sang karaoke to each other .
the groom and his brother posed for the camera .
the guest enjoyed their time laughing together .
output.sentences: The bride and groom happily walked down the aisle after being pronounced "Man and Wife".
Some of the guests sang karaoke at the reception.
The Best Man posed in front of the camera with the groom.
This guest had a good time laughing with the Best Man.
The groom posed with his groomsmen at the reception.
